Posts.Content: Jan 28, 2015 12:22AM positive1978 wrote: hi very worried,  I'm in the Toronto area too and also have a swollen lymph node. Going in for a biopsy on Thursday. I also have a lot of pain and tenderness in the left breast. the Dr said it's probably nothing but let's biopsy it just in case.If u r that worried, you could always go to another hospital for a second opinion. I went to sunnybrook. Keep me posted!
Posts.Title: Please help! Scary ultrasound (atypical enlarged lymph node) Veryworried positive1978
